title: Understanding and Applying Interdisciplinary Research in Educational Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy and science education experience, with basic understanding of educational technology concepts
context.additional_context: Focused on acquiring interdisciplinary research methodologies applicable to real-world tasks for practicing professionals. Project-based assessments produce outcomes applicable to actual work scenarios.

learning_goals: The definition of interdisciplinary research and its relevance to the field of educational technology can be explained
Collaboration cases with adjacent fields such as psychology, communication, and business administration can be analyzed
Interdisciplinary approaches for improving learning and performance can be applied in practical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
